items.sentence: You shouldn't be afraid of me. You should be afraid of Tom.
Tom wasn't the only one who was there. Mary was there, too.
Are you planning to tell Tom why you wanted him to do that?
Do you think Tom would've done it the same way Mary did it?
When I got home, I got into bed and fell asleep right away.
French wasn't as difficult to learn as I expected it to be.
I'll try to stop Tom from doing that, but it won't be easy.
How many loaves of bread do you think you bought last year?
Could you buy me a cup of coffee? I left my wallet at home.
Tom put his hand on top of Mary's and looked into her eyes.
